A

addToCompanyCouponTable(long, long) - Method in class dao.db.CompanyDaoDb
Adds company id and its coupon id to the CompanyCoupon table in the database, after company creates new coupon
addToCustomerCouponTable(long, long) - Method in class dao.db.CustomerDaoDb
Adds customer id and its coupon id to the CustomerCoupon table in the database, after a coupon is being purchased by a customer
AdminFacade - Class in facades
With the admin (administrator) facade - the layer for the business logic - the administrator can create, remove and perform various actions relating to companies & customers
AdminFacade() - Constructor for class facades.AdminFacade
This CTOR instantiates the company, customer & coupon DaoDb layer, in order to allow access to its methods.
AdminFilter - Class in webServices.accessFilters
This filter handles a scenario when a user is trying to access the administrator page, without login and receiving of an admin facade
AdminFilter() - Constructor for class webServices.accessFilters.AdminFilter
 
adminLoggingFilter() - Method in class webServices.accessFilters.FilterUrlConfig
Configures the admin filter for specific URL
AdminWebService - Class in webServices
The admin web service handles the HTTP requests sent from the admin web page (client side)
AdminWebService() - Constructor for class webServices.AdminWebService
 
AlonCouponSystemApplication - Class in webServices
This class runs the spring application and activates the test method in the test class
AlonCouponSystemApplication() - Constructor for class webServices.AlonCouponSystemApplication
 
AlonCouponSystemApplicationTests - Class in webServices
 
AlonCouponSystemApplicationTests() - Constructor for class webServices.AlonCouponSystemApplicationTests
